DOC.brief_summary: The project four primary objective : 1 ) Determine blind rehabilitation improve quality life legally blind veteran ; 2 ) Determine relationship quality life visual function ; 3 ) Determine factor , cognitive status , level depression , age presence additional medical condition besides vision loss , intervention blind rehabilitation extend beyond visually impaired individual improve quality life primary caregiver ( e.g . spouse , partner , family member friend . )
DOC.brief_title: The Impact Rehabilitation Quality Life Visually Impaired
